messages.message: Invalid KTXcubemapIncomplete metadata. The size of the value must be 1 byte.
messages.details: The size of the KTXcubemapIncomplete value is 0 byte(s) but it must be 1 byte.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
